channel.title: Letter Of Marque
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Letter Of Marque" - I need to know if you can only get the Letter of Marque in Season 1.

item.title: Re: Letter Of Marque
item.content:encoded: Thanks guys, I'll just have to stave off looping then.

item.title: Re: Letter Of Marque
item.content:encoded: Lear is partly correct. You can get the Letter in S2, but once you get the Letter, you can also start getting the S2+ NWW items in that same season (if you manage to get enough points before looping).

item.title: Re: Letter Of Marque
item.content:encoded: If you don't already have the Letter of Marque, then you won't be able to get the Season 2 NWW items that Season, if I'm not mistaken. You'll be able to get all the Season 1 NWW items that you didn't get, along with the Letter of Marque, but the Season 2 NWW don't show up until the Season after you get the Letter Marque, I believe.

item.title: Letter Of Marque
item.content:encoded: Can you only get the letter of Marque in season 1, or is it available to you in season 2 if you don't already have it and get all the NWW Items. So in other words, I didn't do the mission in Season 1 to get it, and I'm now in Season 2. When I get all the Season 2 NWW items will I be able to do the mission for it?
